channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023080389
item.description:
Report X-2023080389

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023080389: X RAYED SHIPMENT. NOTICED AN OUTLINE THAT LOOKED LIKE IT MIGHT BE PERFUME. CONFIRMED THROUGH PHYSICAL SEARCH THAT THERE WAS ONE BOTTLE OF PERFUME IN ONE PIECE OF SHIPMENT. X-2023080390: X RAYED SHIPMENT. NOTICED AN OUTLINE THAT LOOKED LIKE IT MIGHT BE PERFUME. CONFIRMED THROUGH PHYSICAL SEARCH THAT THERE WAS ONE BOTTLE OF PERFUME IN ONE PIECE OF SHIPMENT. FOUND NAIL POLISH AS WELL. X-2023080391: X RAYED SHIPMENT. NOTICED AN OUTLINE THAT LOOKED LIKE IT MIGHT BE PERFUME. CONFIRMED THROUGH PHYSICAL SEARCH THAT THERE WAS ONE BOTTLE OF PERFUME IN ONE PIECE OF SHIPMENT. FOUND NAIL POLISH REMOVER AS WELL

item.title: Report X-2023080003
item.description:
Report X-2023080003

  • City: FAI
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023080003: Xray reveled unpackaged firearm. Discovered bullets were loaded. X-2023080004: X-ray revealed a can of cheeze whiz and a can of butter spray, among other undeclared DG in different reports. X-2023080005: X-ray revealed bug spray, that lead to other undeclared DG as well. X-2023080006: Discovery of other DG lead to further inspection of bags

item.title: Report X-2023071253
item.description:
Report X-2023071253

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During screening, found what looked like a bunch of batteries on the xray image. Did a targeted physical search and found a box of rechargeable vapes.20 vapes total. No hazmat markings or labels on outer packaging and it was not declared in the nature of goods.

item.title: Report X-2023080392
item.description:
Report X-2023080392

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WAS UNSURE IF THE CHAINSAW WAS GAS POWERED DUE TO THE WORDING ON THE BOX. IT APPEARED AS IF IT WAS OPEN ALREADY SO WANTED TO VERIFY IF WAS IN FACT A BATTERY POWERED CHAINSAW. VERIFIED THAT IT WAS A BATTERY POWERED CHAINSAW. HOWEVER, THERE WERE 4 LITHIUM BATTERIES INSIDE. VERIFIED WITH AGENT THAT PROCESSED THE AWB THAT THE CUSTOMER SAID THERE WERE NO BATTERIES.

item.title: Report X-2023061456
item.description:
Report X-2023061456

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-24
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA, PACKAGE AUDIT REVEALED TEN HAMMERHEAD KARRO BICYCLE COMPUTERS CONTAINING A 3200MAH LITHIUM ION POLYMER CELLS CONTAINED IN EACH COMPUTER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DANGEROUS GOODS WERE BEING SHIPPED.

item.title: Report X-2023071230
item.description:
Report X-2023071230

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Nature of goods on 1/2 sheet stated laser equipment, x-rayed shipment and saw what appeared to be a battery. Opened the box and inside of the box was a yellow pelican case. Opened the case and found 1 - 52.38 watt hour lithium ion battery packed with equipment. Could not open the piece of equipment to verify if another battery was installed.

  • Description: 1 of 5 buckets found to be leaking in AS warehouse after initial flight. Item had been accepted, transported on initial flight and offloaded with no damage or leakage. Leakage discovered while freight was being gathered for secondary flight. No reports of incidents, damage or leakage prior to discovery.
